title: Indie Game Music (Game Music - Indie Music, 8BIT Music, Background Music)
description: 10 Indie Game Music Pieces that will take your game to the next level! (Music, Game Music, Music Loops, Background Music, Indie Music, 8BIT Music, 8 Bit Music, Calm Music, Casual Music, Retro Music, Synth Music, Arcade Music)
longDescription:
> Listen Here! < | ⬆️Upgrade Now! And Get All Of Our Music Forever In The Ultimate Music Bundle (113 Tracks)


  • All tracks are Loopable to ensure hassle free integration with your game :)
  • 100% Royalty Free - All Tracks Are 100% Royalty Free! Use in your Commercial Games, Videos, Streams or anything else you create!


This pack contains 10 soundtracks and all of their respective Stems are included. Each Track was professionally composed, mixed and mastered by a professional composer/engineer team!
